name: Tiki the Sea Turtle
description:
This small game was created to bring awareness about trash in our oceans. You play as Tiki, a Sea Turtle that loves jellyfish! However, its hard for Tiki to figure out what is plastic and what is a jelly treat. Help Tiki out and collect as many jellyfish as possible!

Instructions on how to set up the game are in the PlzReadMe.txt file in the .zip folder.

This is my first ever game to make and publish!
